items.title: Pentagon plan would create military ‘reaction force’ for civil unrest
items.description: Documents reviewed by The Post detail a new National Guard mission that, if adopted, would require hundreds of troops to be ready around-the-clock.

items.title: Trump says he’s tackled the border. Now he’s onto cities.
items.description: The Washington Post’s essential guide to power and influence in D.C. In today’s edition: Trump declares “liberation day” in the nation’s capital.

items.title: Inside Trump’s decision to deploy the National Guard in D.C.
items.description: President Donald Trump long had a playbook for deploying the National Guard in D.C. and a week ago had new motivation after a former aide was hurt in ...

items.title: Trump’s risky role as the would-be CEO of America
items.description: Trump’s personal approach to running the economy — and other issues from Ukraine to D.C. — departs from traditional conservatism and carries political...

items.title: Trump orders federal takeover of D.C. police, deploys National Guard
items.description: The mayor calls the actions “unsettling and unprecedented” but says D.C. has little choice but to cooperate.
